verses.text: Ha winhaj rey David nanhal svajxaquil ab'il ix yak' reyal winh t'a Hebrón. Ayic ayoch winh reyal t'a Hebrón chi', vacvanh eb' winh yuninal winh ix alji, aton eb' tik: Ha winh b'ab'el, a winhaj Amnón, yune' ix Ahinoam aj Jezreel. Axo winh schab'il, a winhaj Daniel yune' ix Abigail aj Carmel. Axo winh yoxil, a winhaj Absalón, yune' ix Maaca, ix yisil winhaj Talmai sreyal Gesur. Axo winh schanhil, a winhaj Adonías yune' ix Haguit. Axo winh yoil, a winhaj Sefatías yune' ix Abital. Axo winh svaquil, aton winhaj Itream yune' ix Egla. Ixlajwi chi' 33 ab'il pax ix yak' reyal winhaj David chi' t'a Jerusalén.

Ayic ayoch winh reyal t'a Jerusalén chi', 13 to eb' winh yuninal winh ix alji, aton eb' winh tik: Vinhaj Simea, winhaj Sobab, winhaj Natán yet' winhaj Salomón. Ha eb' winh tik, yune' eb' winh ix Betsabé, ix yisil winhaj Amiel.
Ha juntzanhxo eb' winh yuninal winhaj David chi': Aton winhaj Ibhar, winhaj Elisama, winhaj Elifelet, winhaj Noga, winhaj Nefeg, winhaj Jafía, winhaj Elisama, winhaj Eliada yet' winhaj Elifelet.
Yanab' pax ix Tamar juntzanh eb' winh tik. Ch'oc pax yaj juntzanhxo eb' winh yuninal winh yet' juntzanhxo eb' ix schab'il yetb'eyum max b'inajlaj t'a skal eb' winh tik.

Ha eb' winh yinhtilal winhaj Salomón t'a stzolal: Aton winhaj Roboam, winhaj Abías, winhaj Asa, winhaj Josafat, winhaj Joram, winhaj Ocozías, winhaj Joás, winhaj Amasías, winhaj Azarías, winhaj Jotam, winhaj Acaz, winhaj Ezequías, winhaj Manasés, winhaj Amón yet' winhaj Josías.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Josías chi', winh b'ab'el, a winhaj Johanán, winh schab'il, a winhaj Joacim, winh yoxil, a winhaj Sedequías, winh schanhil a winhaj Salum.
Ha eb' winh yuninal winhaj Joacim chi': Aton winhaj Jeconías yet' winhaj Sedequías.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Jeconías winh ik'b'ilb'at preso t'a Babilonia, aton winhaj Salatiel, winhaj Malquiram, winhaj Pedaías, winhaj Senazar, winhaj Jecamías, winhaj Hosama yet' winhaj Nedabías.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Pedaías, aton winhaj Zorobabel yet' winhaj Simei. Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Zorobabel chi': Aton winhaj Mesulam, winhaj Hananías yet' pax ix Selomit yanab' eb' winh.
Ay pax ovanhxo yuninal winhaj Zorobabel chi', aton eb' winh tik: Vinhaj Hasuba, winhaj Ohel, winhaj Berequías, winhaj Hasadías yet' winhaj Jusab-hesed.

Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Hananías chi': Aton winhaj Pelatías yet' winhaj Jesaías. Axo eb' winh yinhtilal winhaj Jesaías chi' t'a stzolal aton eb' winh tik: Vinhaj Refaías, winhaj Arnán, winhaj Abdías yet' winhaj Secanías.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Secanías chi', aton winhaj Semaías, winhaj Hatús, winhaj Igal, winhaj Barías, winhaj Nearías yet' winhaj Safat. Vacvanh eb' winh t'a smasanil.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Nearías oxvanh sb'ey eb' winh. Aton winhaj Elioenai, winhaj Ezequías yet' winhaj Azricam.
Axo eb' winh yuninal winhaj Elioenai chi', ucvanh sb'ey eb' winh: Aton winhaj Hodabías, winhaj Eliasib, winhaj Pelaías, winhaj Acub, winhaj Johanán, winhaj Dalaías yet' winhaj Anani.
